name: Surviving in Dark and Cold
description:
Tab -  to open the crafting and inventory menu.

Enter - to open the pause menu

E - to pick up items

WASD - to move

If your heat gauge, or food gauge goes to zero, you lose.

Sit near a fire to increase heat, find or craft things for food.

Craft a fire and drop it to create a heat point

Put cross down(with red X) and lure enemies near it to defeat them.

Survive for as long as you can
